summary.span: 表示单个笔划墨迹。

span.span: Represents a single ink stroke.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个是从指针设备，如 tablet 笔或鼠标收集的数据对象。A is the data object that is collected from a pointing device, such as a tablet pen or a mouse. 可以创建和操作以编程方式，而且可以表示以可视方式上启用手写内容的元素，如。The can be created and manipulated programmatically, and can be represented visually on an ink-enabled element, such as the . 一个包含有关其位置和外观的信息。A contains information about both its position and appearance. 属性是一系列对象的指定位置的。The property is a collection of objects that specifies the position of the . 属性指定笔画的外观。The property specifies a stroke's appearance.

summary.span: 根据指定的 对象执行变换。

span.span: Performs a transformation based upon the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示用于在二维空间中进行转换的 3x3 矩阵。The object represents a 3x3 matrix used for transformations in two-dimensional space. 通过提供矩阵转换 Stroke 对象的每个点。Each point of the Stroke object is transformed by the supplied Matrix. 有关示例的原始的 Point.Y 值为 55，如果原始 Point.X 值为 100，转换 Matrix.Scale （0.5，0.5）、 新 Point.X 值为 50，最新的 Point.Y 值为 27.5。For example if the original Point.X value is 100, the original Point.Y value is 55, and the transformation Matrix.Scale(0.5, 0.5), the new Point.X value is 50 and the new Point.Y value is 27.5. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将转换对象。The following example demonstrates how to transform a object. [!code-csharp[DrawTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawTransform/CSharp/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DrawTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawTransform/VisualBasic/Module1.vb#1)]
